data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Intertidal: site temperature data: Yachats Beach, Oregon, USA (YBHX00)

This metadata record describes a mix of intertidal seawater and air temperature data collected at Yachats Beach, Oregon, USA by PISCO. Measurements were collected using micro-T Temperature Logger (NexSens DS1921G) beginning 2005-11-13. Site temperature loggers are bolted down in a wire cage at various locations within each site. Mussel growth temperature loggers are bolted down in a wire cage at high, mid, or low positions within a mussel bed. Temperature is recorded at 60.0 minute intervals.
